ygData.subject: Re: Total Chaos in Africa
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, sorry if I missed some damage here, but I m kinda in a big hurry. ... Prowl s boosters kick back in right before he hits the ground, several shots flying

Ok, sorry if I missed some damage here, but I'm kinda in a big hurry.

::Prowl/FZ/Lavatron/Grimmler/Kluster/Perndabot::

Prowl's boosters kick back in right before he hits the ground, 
several shots flying by him. He flies back upward, heading for FZ.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot hits the ground hard, remaining where he lay as his systems 
repowered from FZ's energy draining field.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Lavatron gets to his feet, growling when he sees a Maximal gestalt 
enter the battlefield. He powers his hands for a lightning blast, but 
then decides that the two gestalts were too close.

Instead, he changes his aim, a giant lightning bolt smashing into the 
unshielded hull of the Cybertronian Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler growls, firing several more shots at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ swirls out of the way of Prowl, but is hit by Prowl's wing and is 
sent spinning down toward the ground. He stabalizes, firing several 
shots at Prowl and recieving Nemesis Enforcer's message.

"Forget Iron Raptor, get Kluster and bring him to me. I can 
significantly help us in this battle that way."
